item.description:
A leisurely Paddle from the Odiorne State Park boat launch into Little Harbor then under bridge and to the right around Leach & Pest Islands then over to and up Sagamore River.

This is a Level 2  paddle for tide/current and winds.

See our About Us page for Skill Levels http://www.meetup.com/NESeacoastPaddlers/about/

Kayaks of at least 12 feet plus of length with bulk heads required. PFD's "life vests"must be worn at all times. Put in is at the Odiorne Boat Launch boat launch. There is also a very small public launch for a few cars across on the other side of bridge. High tide is approximately 1:30 P.M so we'll be paddling with tide flooding into the harbor, bays and Sagamore river. We may stop on the return at BG's Boat House Restaurant for an early dinner so if this interests you bring cash or plastic. BG's Boat House restaurant is on Sagamore River and you can paddle right up to it and land.

Note: There is a $5 launch/parking fee at Odiorne State Park. Boat Launch is at the little Bridge on Rt 1A. before or after the Main Park Entrance depending if you are coming from Portsmouth or Rye. Check the map link below for details of launch site.

Directions:

http://maps.google.com/maps?q=@43.048397,-70.727510
item.name: Little Harbor & Sagamore River Paddle
